We are looking for a Full Stack Developer to produce scalable software solutions. 
Location: Cairo, Egypt

You‚Äôll be part of a cross-functional team that‚Äôs responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.

As a Full Stack Developer, you should be comfortable around both front-end and back-end coding languages (very strong at Angular, PHP, HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, development frameworks and third-party libraries. You should also be a team player with a knack for visual design and utility.

If you‚Äôre also familiar with Agile methodologies, we‚Äôd like to meet you.

Email: info@bznsbuilder.com
Subject: Full Stack Developer 
BznsBuilder 

Responsibilities:
- Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions.
- Design client-side and server-side architecture
- Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design 
- Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
- Write effective APIs
- Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
- Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
- Create security and data protection settings
- Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
- Write technical documentation

Recently, I completed two years working at HackerEarth , it was super adventurous ride of work, learnings, uncertainties, and most importantly fun! Work anniversaries to me are like my birthdays, I get so excited. My coolly responsible manager Shruti Vishnoi is an embodiment of mentor, friend, sister, reliable human, and whatnot. I have had some best experiences and learning working with her. Thank you for the pleasant surprise and for making me feel very special, Shruti. 

My team (on the screen) is very special, motivated, and loving. Can't thank you all enough for coming together to celebrate the

Here's a great tip for those of you that are experiencing some down time during this pandemic. 

Be proactive. 

Take advantage of this time to polish up your resumes, connect with Recruiters, HR Managers and those that are in the field that you're looking to get into. Express your interest and sell yourself.

Expanding your network is a good thing. Although some companies are experiencing a hiring freeze Recruiters are proactively looking for potential candidates.

Although the position isn't open today it will be soon. Put yourself ahead of the game.

Wind Turbine Mechanical Engineer - Structural design

Mechanical /Civil/ Structural Engineer for Wind Turbine design.

In Aldott, We are hiring parttime/freelancers/consultants structural engineer.

Ideally, you have some experience in structural design using steel / tower.

You will join a team that is responsible for the design of systems and components for new concept & large scale wind turbines at multi-MW ratings

New Product design includes the following: Structures (Tower), Rotor Systems (Hub), Blade. Onshore and offshore

Mechanical /civil Engineering Degree.
Experience in wind turbine design.
Proven mechanical system and component design experience using world-class tools and methods are essential.
Advantage if you have any structural / tower/welding experience.

About US! 
ALDOTT is a growing organization in the field of Wind Energy. Its footprint in Asia and EU is increasing rapidly with our Quarter 2 (FY 2020-2021) order up by 41%. The growing confidence of our client in our capacity and capability becomes proud to us. 

We provide independent engineering consultancy services in the onshore and offshore wind. 

Please send your CV to jeong@aldott.de, along with your Linkedin profile and recommendation!

BTW the post says you should be passionate about Ads, you don't need to be passionate about ads, but perhaps be intrigued.

--Startup experience preferred
--Must be comfortable being an individual contributor initially

If this sounds like you or someone you know, please send your resume/portfolio to: trista@questgroups.com
